Title: American Relief Agency - Report on American relief work. 13
Notes: American relief supports and helps 22 national general purpose projects to help 10 million people find work. (upper picture) Ten million mu of land can be reclaimed by the construction of sluices and dikes. The picture on the left, taken at the Qiantang river (钱塘江) near Hangzhou, shows the reclaimed land after the construction of dikes.Nr. 13 of the poster set on the Economic Aid Agreement between the United States of America and the Republic of China (3 July 1948).
